QuestData.Title: Rider on the Storm
QuestData.Description: You cannot help but to feel a twinge of pride, having unlocked this long lost secret of the ancient worshippers of Elune.$b$bYou now possess the power to inflict great damage upon your enemy.$b$bAs it was Furien's tireless work that made this possible, it only seems right that the weapon should be unleashed upon those who took his life.$b$bThe Alliance scum at Nijel's Point shall pay for their offenses against the Horde!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Raging Vortex Gem at Nijel's Point Ruin. While commanding your firestorm, kill 40 Nijel's Point Defenders and burn 15 Nijel's Point Merchants.$b$bShould you lose your Raging Vortex Gem, you may acquire another from the Ancient Vortex Runestone.
QuestData.RewardText: Very impressive, $c.$b$bYou completed Furien's work and rained vengeance down upon his killers.$b$bYou have brought peace to my brother's soul, and to my mind. Please accept this gift for your diligence.
